title: Female acting in 'reckless manner' accidentally shoots man in the head
content:
A man was accidentally shot in the head at a Tuscaloosa apartment complex on Wednesday, Tuscaloosa Police said.
Officers said Ralynne Jemison, 19, shot the unidentified 22-year-old male while "acting in a reckless manner" at Boardwalk Apartments at 5501 Old Montgomery Highway. There wasn't an altercation between the male the female before the shooting, according to witnesses.
The victim was taken to the hospital in serious condition. Jemison was arrested and charged with first-degree assault. She was taken to Tuscaloosa County Jail on a $15,000 bond.
